name: Ozamanas
description:
In this fast-paced strategy game you control the forces of nature to restore the balance of the Amazon Rainforest, affected by the destructive expansion of human beings.
  • Take control of ancestral forces inspired by endemic species of the amazon rainforest
  • Battle the expanding onslaught of human machines trying to destroy the rainforest
  • Experience an exhilarating hybrid of turn-based and real-time mechanics
  • Enjoy an unique art style and fluid hand-drawn animations
  • Listen to an expanding original soundtrack inspired by the sounds of the rainforest
Currently in development by Studio GG Brothers out of Cali, Colombia
Give us your feedback by filling out our playtesting survey
